Uses of Interface
menuClases.Action

  • Packages that use Action 
    Package Description
    menuClases  

    • Uses of Action in menuClases

      Classes in menuClases that implement Action 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddNewCompanyAction
      This class Describes the Add New Company Action of the Administration of Company's Menu.
      class  AddNewShareholderAction
      This Class describes the Add new Shareholder Option of the Shareholder Administration Menu.
      class  AddSharesToCompanyAction
      This Class describes the Add Shares to Company of the Administration of Stocks Menu
      class  AdministrationOfCompaniesActions
      This class describes the action related to the Administration of Company's option in the Main Menu.
      class  AdministrationOfShareHoldersActions
      This class describes the action related Administration of Shareholders option from the Main Menu.
      class  AdministrationOfStocksAction
      This Class describes the action executed by the Administration of Stocks option in the Main Menu.
      class  BuyandSellAction
      This Class describes the action for the buy or sell option form the Main Menu
      class  ExitAction
      THis Class describes the Exit Action displayed in every menu.
      class  RemoveCompanyAction
      This class describes the Remove Company Option in the Administration of Company's Menu
      class  RemoveShareholderAction
      This Class describes the Remove Shareholder Option from the Administration of Shareholders Menu.
      class  ShowCompanyPortfolioAction
      This Class describes the Show Company Portfolio option of the Company Administration Menu.
      class  ShowReportAction
      This class describes the action of the Show Report option in the Administration of Company's Menu.
      class  ShowShareholderPortfolioAction
      This Class describes the Show Shareholder Portfolio option in the Administration of Shareholder's Menu
      class  SplitStockAction
      This class describes the action of the Split Stock option in the Administration of Stocks Menu.
      class  UpdateStockValueAction
      This class describes the action of the Update Stock Value option in the Administration of Stock's Menu.
      Methods in menuClases that return Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Action Option.getAction()
      Returns the action Executed by the selection of this option.
      Constructors in menuClases with parameters of type Action 
      Constructor and Description
      Option(java.lang.String description, Action action)
      Constructor
